reviews.text: One of the best food delivery services in Kyiv! After moving to Kyiv from Los Angeles where I had tried almost every healthy food delivery service available, I have to accept that FoodEx holds even higher standards of service than I am used to in LA. I am impressed with creativity of the FoodEx chef, love the choice of ingredients, no matter which program you try. Service is also wonderful: if they say they deliver at 9:18AM - be sure to stand by the door at 9:18AM - FoodEx drivers work like a clock!) Customer service reps are polite, kind and ready to accommodate all of your needs. I have used FoodEx service multiple times, using it now and for sure will use in the future! A+++++
not only healthy but also very delicious

I didn't want to write a review, but the dinner in the photo (it's minced salmon and something like pea puree) is unlikely to bother my teeth so much, rather, salmon cuts are used in this way.
"As for the cuisine - many dishes are not tasty in my opinion, plus there are dishes in which everything is ground into an incomprehensible puree - I like it when I understand the ingredients and see what they are eating.
Regarding the change of dishes - I don't like that you charge extra - in other deliveries I was made a change without extra payment for the ration"
This is the feedback I left on the issue of support...
In short, it is tasteless, expensive, overestimated (I can compare with 4 different deliveries), I understand that no conclusions are drawn...

Unfortunately, I can't rate it higher than 2.
I ordered the “Smart lunch” diet for 5 days.

Minuses:

1. There is no way to indicate food allergies or exclude some foods from the diet; for this you need to pay an additional fee of about 100 UAH per day, since this is already considered an “individual program”.
I think this is a big and fat minus for the client and a great way to upsell for the company 🥲
Thus, they brought me food, where every day I definitely missed at least one dish due to the fact that I do not eat fresh/lightly salted fish and seaweed, and also because some dishes were so unpalatable that it was impossible to eat them 🤷🏻‍ ♀️

2. Expectation/reality. I am attaching a photo of the food, no comments.

3. At the end of the ration delivery period, the manager asked for feedback, which I did. Pointing out the shortcomings very honestly.
From my experience, any good company always apologizes and offers to improve in order to smooth out the impression, but the manager decided to sell me an individual “Smurt Lunch” program for 445 UAH (which is 2 snacks and one meal for 850-1100 kcal), which, Objectively speaking, it is very unprofitable.

And yet, eating five meals a day is a relic of the past, which only endlessly increases blood sugar levels and provokes the production of insulin and does not allow the body to rest.
There should be pauses in eating, and high blood sugar levels all day long do not lead to anything good, but on the contrary :)

Pros:

Polite and pleasant couriers 🙌🏻

great service! delivery on time! always adapt to changes in plans!
the food is delicious, 80% of the time I eat everything with great pleasure
in a week and a half minus 3.5 kg
